gameOver(int) - Method in class controller.WarCardGameServerController
sends a popup box to both players informing them of the winner and reinitializes the game
GenericCardGameCard - Class in model

GenericCardGameCard(GenericCardGameCard.Value, GenericCardGameCard.Suit) - Constructor for class model.GenericCardGameCard
creates a simple card with a value, a suit, and two picture representations(back view/front view) retrieves the appropriate picture associated with the value and suit of the card
GenericCardGameCard.Display - Enum in model
 
GenericCardGameCard.Suit - Enum in model
 
GenericCardGameCard.Value - Enum in model
each enum has been given a value in brackets behind it this will allow us to compare their values later note: in some games the ACE will be low and this may have to be changed
